My name is Xiangmin Sun. Sam is chosen as my pseudonym to facilitate communication. I am a postdoc on eddy covariance measurement and isotopic ecohydrology, at Arizona State University. When not wrangling with data or being innovative in research, Xiangmin (Sam) enjoys playing table tennis and baminton, and reading in history and psychology.
